name: DataStarUpdateTfsBuild
description: Updates TFS builds attributes using a JSON string
author: Absolute Technology Limited
releaseNotes: The task uses the TFS Web Service API to update build attributes using a Json String.

inputs.name: JsonString
inputs.label: Json String
inputs.helpMarkDown: The JSON string payload to be applied to the TFS builds.

inputs.name: BuildIds
inputs.label: Build Ids
inputs.helpMarkDown: The comma seperated list of build ids to which the update should be applied

inputs.name: FailOnStderr
inputs.label: Fail on Standard Error
inputs.helpMarkDown: If this is true, this task will fail if any errors are written to the StandardError stream.

inputs.name: RepositoryUri
inputs.label: TFS Repository Uri
inputs.helpMarkDown: The TFS Server Url (defaults to the BUILD_REPOSITORY_URI)

inputs.name: BearerToken
inputs.label: Bearer Token
inputs.helpMarkDown: Optional security token if not using default credentials

inputs.name: Username
inputs.label: Username
inputs.helpMarkDown: Optional username if not using default credentials

inputs.name: Password
inputs.label: Password
inputs.helpMarkDown: Optional password if not using default credentials. **Use a Variable to encrypt the Password.**

inputs.name: UseProxyServer
inputs.label: Use Proxy Server
inputs.helpMarkDown: Use a proxy server, if the Url is not specified it will try to determine the proxy server automatically.

inputs.name: ProxyUsername
inputs.label: Proxy Username
inputs.helpMarkDown: Optional username if not using default credentials

inputs.name: ProxyPassword
inputs.label: ProxyPassword
inputs.helpMarkDown: Optional password if not using default credentials. **Use a Variable to encrypt the Password.**
